function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High concentration of market share in a few countries for computer-related products and phones.","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to supply chain disruptions and economic shocks.","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply sources and development of local manufacturing capabilities.","Technologies":"Supply chain management software and tracking systems, automation and robotics for local manufacturing.","People":"Countries heavily reliant on imported computer-related products and phones.","Owner":"Government, industry associations, and international trade organizations."},{"Description":"Extreme concentration of trade in a few importing/exporting firms.","Impact":"Increased exposure to shocks and disruptions in international trade.","Mitigation":"Support for small and medium-sized trading firms, promotion of diversified trading relationships.","Technologies":"Trade analytics software, market intelligence platforms, and financial support for small traders.","People":"Small and medium-sized trading firms.","Owner":"Government trade agencies and business development organizations."},{"Description":"Reliance on foreign value-added and export demand in global value chains.","Impact":"Vulnerability to foreign supply shocks and demand shocks from final consumers or distributive services abroad.","Mitigation":"Promotion of local sourcing and development of backward and forward linkages in value chains.","Technologies":"Supply chain mapping tools, international trade data analytics, and investment in domestic production capacities.","People":"Countries heavily reliant on foreign value-added and export demand.","Owner":"Government trade and economic development agencies, industry associations."}]}
